thread.title: Palestinian knifes another soldier, shot dead
thread.title_full: Palestinian knifes another soldier, shot dead | News24

author: news24.com
title: Palestinian knifes another soldier, shot dead
text:
Jerusalem - A Palestinian disguised as a news photographer stabbed and wounded a soldier on Friday at an entrance to the West Bank settlement of Kiryat Arba before being shot dead, the army said.
Military spokesperson Arye Shalicar said the way the man was dressed "allowed him to approach the soldier".
The foreign ministry distributed photos of a man said to be the attacker wearing a shirt with the word "press" stamped on it and a fluorescent yellow vest.
In another unverified photo posted online, he is seen attacking a soldier with a knife.
